Enroll in a sailing course: Take a sailing course to learn the skills necessary to navigate a sailboat across the Atlantic. This will not only help you achieve your goal but also give you a sense of accomplishment and boost your confidence.

Create a virtual sailing experience: Use virtual reality technology to create a realistic sailing experience. You can control the boat, set the sails, and navigate through different routes while feeling like you're actually on the water.

Start a support group: Joining a support group for people who are trying to achieve similar goals can be helpful in overcoming feelings of jealousy. You can share your experiences, ask for advice, and motivate each other to keep going.

Start a journal: Writing down your thoughts and feelings can help you process them and gain insight into why you feel jealous. You can also use this journal as a way to track your progress and celebrate your achievements along the way.

Find inspiration from others: Instead of focusing on what others have achieved, find inspiration from their journey. Read about their experiences, watch videos, and listen to podcasts to learn more about what it takes to accomplish a goal like navigating a sailboat across the Atlantic. This can help you stay motivated and focused on your own path.
